law.text: The Administrative Office of the Courts shall provide administrative support for, and maintain the records of, judicial nominating commissions. The director of the Administrative Office of the Courts shall certify the costs for these services to the Chief Justice who, upon verification, shall certify the expenses for payment out of the State Treasury.
law.history: Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 51, sec. 3, effective March 9, 1976.
